title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, RAG, multi-user) packaged as a Docker container.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example that pairs Ollama embeddings with a local vector DB for question-answering over documents.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models, conversation history, syntax highlighting, and keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, fine-tuning, and edge deployment of Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to the Ollama local LLM server.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package for interacting with Ollama from Python; chat, embed, pull, push, and list models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chat interface using Next.js and the Ollama JS client for quick local prototyping.

title: ollama-rust-candle
summary: Experimental Rust project running Ollama compatible GGUF models directly with Candle for edge devices.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF/GGML models tested and ready to pull via Ollama Modelfile URLs.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, integrations, and troubleshooting around the Ollama ecosystem.
